bibl.title: The Language of Greek Comedy
bibl.note: While editing and translating Menander, the author noted down the normal and variant spellings of those words which in Attica, at the time of Menander, were commonly or occasionnally spelt in two or more different ways.
bibl.seg: ARNOTT W. Geoffrey, Some Orthographical Variants in the Papyri of Later Greek Comedy.
Andreas WILLI (Ed.), The Language of Greek Comedy (Oxford, 2002) pp. 191-218.
